channel.title: Summer '22 Week 2 :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Video Script Hello and welcome to the week two announcements video for CIS 527 in summer 2022. So this week you should be finishing up lab one. Lab one grading is due tonight by 7pm. So if you havenâ€™t scheduled a time to meet with me for grading, make sure you do that ASAP. I do have trainings on Monday afternoons from about one to three, I usually get done with those a little earlier.
